name: Scotch Heavy Duty Shipping Packing Tape, Clear, Shipping and Packaging Supplies, 1.88 in. x 22.2 yd., 6 Tape Rolls with 1 Dispenser
short_description: PACKING TAPE: 6 rolls of Scotch Heavy Duty Shipping Packing Tape with a dispenser for convenient application offers excellent holding power for your holiday packing and shipping needs

INDUSTRIAL-STRENGTH ADHESIVE: Industrial- strength, solvent-free adhesive adheres instantly to lock in the heavy-duty contents of your boxes and lock out everything else, even through rough handling conditions
FOR ALL BOX TYPES: Box tape that works on all types of boxes, including harder-to-stick 100% recycled boxes
JUST ONE STRIP NEEDED: Shipping tape that resists slivering, splitting and tearing to keep your boxes sealed with just one strip on each seam
IDEAL FOR: Sealing parcels and packages, as well as sealing moving boxes or packing away seasonal decorations
USE WITH TAPE DISPENSER: Dispenser (included) provides precise cuts and features fall-back tabs to help ensure tape doesn’t fall back on the roll, keeping it ready for the next use
PACKAGE CONTENTS: One package contains 1 dispenser and 6 tape rolls that are 1.88 in. x 22.2 yd., on a 1.5-in. core
SCOTCH BRAND PACKAGE PROTECTION: With a full range of adhesive solutions, Scotch Brand delivers confidence in superior results to get the job done well and effectively the first time
HASSLE-FREE: Included dispenser includes fall-back tabs to help ensure the tape doesn't fall back on the roll and will be 'ready-to-roll' for the next use
product_description: Scotch Heavy Duty Shipping Packing Tape provides excellent holding power for your packaging and shipping needs. This 3.0-mil thick (typical) box sealing tape holds strong on all box types, including harder-to-stick 100% recycled boxes, and is guaranteed to stay sealed (1). Designed with industrial-strength, solvent-free adhesive, this tape locks in the heavy-duty contents of your boxes and locks out everything else, even through rough handling conditions. Scotch Heavy Duty Shipping Packing Tape features instant adhesion and resists slivering, splitting and tearing to keep your moving boxes closed. Whether you're shipping heavy items, moving across the country or packing away seasonal decorations, this adhesive tape is equipped to keep your boxes sealed with just one strip on each seam. Each roll of box tape features a release coating to make unwinding easy, and also included is a convenient dispenser that makes application a breeze. (1) If your box does not stay sealed, 3M will refund the purchase price of this tape. Proof of purchase required. Contact: 1-800-3MHELPS (2) Typical Value

Special Feature ‎GUARANTEED TO STAY SEALED*: Boxes sealed with Scotch® Heavy Duty Packaging Tape are guaranteed to stay sealed. (If your box does not stay sealed, 3M will refund the purchase price of this tape. Proof of purchase required. Call 1-800-3M-HELPS)

name: Heavy Duty Shipping Tape Dispenser: TENDO° Essential Line – Reusable, Replaceable, Eco-Friendly 2’’ Master Piece Dispenser for Pros with Patented 10° Sloped Chromium Blades - P-2200 (4th Gen.)_Red
short_description: CUT THE TAPE EASILY WITH 10° TILTED BLADE – Our patented blade is tilted by 10 degrees. So, you can cut the tape easily even with just a little bit of force. Chromium plating and 10 steps of abrasive processes of Tendo’s Blade provide strong durability and cutting power. Blade Replacement Function is also available.
CENTER LINE ON THE BLADE – Center line allows easy centering of the box and tape, allowing for a clean taping that is not skewed to one side.
SPEED UP and SAVE TIME - Our press plate beneath blade improves working speed by pressing and pasting the tape simultaneously with cutting.

ERGONOMIC DESIGNS WITH DURABLENESS - Ergonomically curved handles, for minimizing wrist fatigue from long-time usage, are surely innovative. With just a small grip force, sensitive tension controls are possible. Also, Its handle is made of rubber(TPE), so it provides a stable grip without slipping.
BOTH RIGHT HANDED and LEFT HANDED CAN USE - The rubber handle can be moved from side to side, so both right-handed and left-handed can use it comfortably.
Compatible With 1.77 " ~ 2" X 109 Yard Sealing Tapes

name: Packing Tape Dispenser - Heavy Duty Shipping Tape Dispenser for Boxes, Refillable, Fits Standard Bulk Tapes Up to 2" Wide - Razor-Sharp Cutting Packaging Tape Dispenser (1-Count)
short_description: Always Find the Tape Edge: This durable dispenser saves time and reduces hassle by keeping the tape edge ready to go. (Tape not included.)
Multi-Purpose Use: Ideal for sealing boxes, shipping packages, bundling, moving, and other packing applications for home, office, or industrial needs.
Razor-Sharp Precision Cuts: Achieve clean, accurate cuts every time with the dispenser’s sharp, efficient cutting mechanism.
Universal Compatibility: This dispenser fits tapes up to 2 inches wide with standard 3-inch cores, including carton sealing, duct, drywall mesh, and masking tapes.
Refillable & Reliable: Built for long-term use, this dispenser is quick to refill and ready for your toughest packing jobs.

product_description: This Excell Steel Premium Extra Wide Multi-Rolls Desktop Tape Dispenser is perfect for any office or home setting. It features a durable steel construction The dispenser holds three 1-inch wide rollers so you can use the dispenser for one 3-inch wide roll or three individual 1-inch wide tape rolls or one 2-inch wide roll and one 1-inch wide roll. Holds 5 inches in maximum outside roll diameter so it works great for office supply tapes . It also has a handy tape cutter built-in for easy and convenient use. The tape dispenser is easy to refill and has a convenient handle for easy portability. It is ideal for use in schools, offices, warehouses, and other commercial or home settings.
